programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: When entertaining, we like desserts that look more complicated to prepare than they really are. A chocolate mousse cake or chilled lemon soufflé requires basic ingredients but is sure to elicit the proper oohs and aahs from guests.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We like appetizers that deliver big flavor without much work. This means spiced nuts that are not overly sweet, spinach dip that is bold and creamy (not watery and insipid), and beef satay that is tender and vibrant.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Most cooks are under the impression that good soup takes all day to prepare. We'll show you how to make simplified versions of two favorite soups: chicken noodle and Italian pasta and bean.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Soup for supper is an appealing concept, especially on a cold night. But for soup to work as a main course, it better be hearty. Our vibrant lentil soup fits the bill, and we round out this meal with quick cheese bread.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Some local dishes become so popular that they transcend their region. Gumbo is a taste of Louisiana in a big old bowl. And Cincinnati chili is American original, served with buttered spaghetti, kidney beans, cheddar cheese, and chopped onions.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: It sometimes seems the simplest recipes suffer the worst fate in modern cookbooks. The test kitchen was committed to breathing new life into these old-fashioned American recipes: stuffed pork chops, gravy, and glazed carrots.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We offer two inspired takes on roast chicken. Our roast lemon chicken ends with a twist. And there's nothing conventional about cooking a butterflied chicken under a brick. But these two recipes both deliver crisp skin and lots of flavors.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Quick and easy weeknight cooking can still yield great results. We start with two quick-cooking classics— sautéed chicken cutlets and pan-seared shrimp—and elevate them from the everyday.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: In this episode, we offer delicious, relatively straightforward fare that appeals to young and old. What kid—or adult—doesn't look forward to macaroni and cheese or barbecued chicken?

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We take some of our favorite restaurant recipes—Crab Towers and Flambéed Pan-Roasted Lobster—and show you how to make them work in a home kitchen.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Huge meaty flavor—combined with spice, smoke, and fire—epitomizes Texas barbecue. Could we figure out how to make authentic Texas beef ribs in our Boston-based test kitchen?

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: On occasion, we break the bank and buy a beef tenderloin. The tender, buttery interior is the big draw, and the combination of a healthy dose of seasoning and the flavor from the grill is a perfect solution to an otherwise mild-tasting piece of meat.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: In this episode, we prepare grilled chicken with a sweet-and-sour dipping sauce and grilled salmon with a sweet, sticky glaze.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: In this episode, we prepare chicken enchiladas and Mexican rice.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Sure, raw tomato sauces are fast, but if the sauce is watery and bland, who cares? Likewise, asparagus-based pasta sauces are often bland and boring. In this episode, we keep things simple while avoiding these common problems.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: The test kitchen prepares two Indian favorites: chicken biryani and mulligatawny soup.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Pissaladière is Provençal street food, a fragrant, pizza-like tart prized for its contrast of salty black olives and anchovies against a backdrop of sweet caramelized onions and thyme. We figure out how to make a great version of this French classic.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Too often, eggplant Parmesan is a soggy, oily mess. And pasta with chicken and broccoli is heavy and bland. But after many tests in the kitchen, we've come up with recipes that give these simple, honest dishes the respect they deserve.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Pasta all' amatriciana is perhaps Rome's most famous dish. Despite the fancy name, it's nothing more than long-strand pasta sauced with tomatoes, onion, bacon, and hot pepper flakes and dusted with cheese. We show you how to master this simple dish.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Osso buco, literally "bone with a hole," is the Italian term for veal shanks. This meaty cut, akin to beef shanks or lamb shanks, becomes meltingly tender when stewed for several hours in a covered pot. We serve it with a simple and satisfying polenta.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Our goal was simple: Take French onion soup and baked goat cheese salad and make stellar versions of these bistro favorites.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: A sticky bun should be neither dense nor bready, neither saturated with butter nor so sugary that it makes your heart race. The crumb should be tender and feathery and the sticky glaze gently chewy and gooey. Here's how we made ours.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Brownies are too often dull, and blondies (as well as congo bars, their coconut-flavored cousins) can be even worse, since they are even plainer. We decided to keep things simple while focusing on developing superior flavor and texture.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: The holidays are stressful enough. We created a foolproof rolled butter cookie dough that tasted great and can be turned into an array of different cookies.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Cakes baked in Bundt and tube pans are popular for a variety of reasons. These pans make cakes that are especially attractive, and the cakes themselves tend to be pretty simple to prepare. In this episode, we make angel food and a chocolate Bundt cake.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We wanted to develop the perfect pumpkin cheesecake recipe, but we never figured it would take 30 cheesecakes to develop a great recipe worthy of the finest holiday dinner.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Watch as we take two modern classic desserts —a chocolate volcano cake and caramelized pears—and make them approachable for the home cook.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Asuntos familiares
programme.desc: Gibbs cuestiona la capacidad de DiNozzo para hacer su trabajo cuando el mayor de los DiNozzo se involucra en su última investigación, en el episodio 150 de NCIS.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: París
programme.desc: Cuando la testigo estrella del gobierno en un caso de malversación es objetivo de un asesino, depende del equipo ayudarla a llegar a casa con vida.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): La verdad sobre mentir
programme.desc: Danny y Baez investigan la muerte de una adolescente empujada al metro. Frank se molesta por la supervisión del nuevo Inspector General en el NYPD.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Desaparecida
programme.desc: Danny y Baez sospechan que una niña podría ser víctima de secuestro, pero su madre lo niega, aunque su historia no cuadra. Mientras, Frank visita a un sacerdote, consejero del NYPD, arrestado por conducir ebrio.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Músculo
programme.desc: Jamie es cuestionado por la muerte de un pandillero que perseguía. Baez se infiltra para investigar al prometido de la ex de Danny, quien vende drogas desde su gimnasio.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Apuestas mortales
programme.desc: Un oficial es acusado de usar fuerza excesiva, lo que pone al departamento bajo escrutinio. Danny y Maria investigan el asesinato de un corredor de valores endeudado.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando la ex miembro del equipo de la UAC y actual agente de la Interpol, Emily Prentiss localiza a un asesino en serie internacional, pide la ayuda de sus amigos de la UAC.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC está buscando a un sospechoso que está desfigurando víctimas a propósito. Además, Rossi tiene un encuentro incómodo con su exesposa, Hayden Montgomery, quien mantuvo a su hija, Joy, en secreto durante casi 30 años.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando los guardias de la prisión en Virginia interceptan un paquete de pruebas relacionadas con el secuestro de dos niños hace varios años, la UAC interroga a un famoso asesino serial que puede tener información sobre el paradero de los niños.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC se sorprende cuando Hotch es arrestado por un equipo SWAT y por sospecha de conspiración, mientras el equipo se apresura a demostrar su inocencia, sospechan que se avecina un complot mayor.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Fe
programme.desc: Cuando el hijo alistado de un coronel retirado convertido en predicador aparece muerto, el equipo cree que puede ser víctima de un crimen de odio. Mientras tanto, el padre de Gibbs viene de visita por vacaciones.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Ignición
programme.desc: Cuando un piloto de la Marina es encontrado muerto en extrañas circunstancias en una zona aislada, el equipo se encuentra luchando contra un abogado sin escrúpulos con una agenda oculta.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Asuntos familiares
programme.desc: Gibbs cuestiona la capacidad de DiNozzo para hacer su trabajo cuando el mayor de los DiNozzo se involucra en su última investigación, en el episodio 150 de NCIS.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: París

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A motorcyclist tries to escape on foot, a couple's synthetic marijuana use catches up with them, and an officer tries to get the real story behind a domestic disturbance.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A skittish driver’s decision results in a trip to the hospital. A car full of young men swear they were trying to escape an imminent threat. An innocent woman struggles with the decision to press charges on her friend.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A little rain doesn’t stop a determined quad driver from trying to outrun police. A deputy has doubts about a man’s professed distrust of banks. A man ignores obvious red flags when buying a moped and ends up paying the price.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A soft-spoken cyclist finds a way to shock deputies. A family man remorsefully agrees with police that his COVID-19 fears led him to make a mistake. Officers investigate a car they spot swerving on the road.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: The owner of a truck discovers what happens when you don’t lock your door. Police level with a troubled man and implore him to make better choices. An officer acts as a therapist for multiple people and their relationships.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Deputies work together to stay on the tail of a fleeing vehicle. An argumentative driver keeps his friends tuned in as he livestreams his own arrest. A mother’s desire to scare her daughter into behaving takes a serious turn.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Deputies are concerned when a fleeing man leaves a trail of illicit items. A young woman unwisely decides to hang out with a man she nicknamed 'Sketchy.' Some well-placed security cameras help reunite a man with his stolen bike.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man weaves a stolen motorbike through traffic at high speeds as he tries to evade police. Deputies examine the aftermath of a violent domestic argument. A mom and dad deny that their habits could affect their child.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police question the legitimacy of the name a driver gives them. Both husband and wife protect each other in a case of domestic violence. A 12-year friendship is jeopardized when a woman suspects her roommate of stealing.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A woman asks police to get involved after her ex threatened to destroy her home. Prior medical procedures drive a woman to find a dangerous way to ease her pain. Deputies search for a mysterious driver who fled a car crash.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A seasoned corporal gives some advice to a young man with a new motorcycle. A woman’s impatience lands her in hot water when she’s pulled over for tailgating. Officers give a driver multiple chances to come clean to no avail.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A woman makes a desperate attempt to frame her friend right in front of deputies. A driver’s assortment of containers raises some questions. A man in possession of a stolen truck insists that his friend is the one at fault.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Fleeing suspects risk their safety by hiding in a dangerous swamp. For one driver, a broken truck turns out to be the start of a very long list of problems. Deputies sympathize with a woman who’s been put through the wringer.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man has a hard time making his case when a bag of illicit items has his name on it. A talkative driver tells officers a long story with conflicting details. A couple calls for help when they find an alligator in their yard.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers are dumbfounded when a man tries to talk them into taking him to jail. Sparks fly when a driver tries to take his truck on the freeway with only two wheels. Deputies are on guard when they approach a belligerent man.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A generous boyfriend steps in to prevent his girlfriend from going to jail. Officers save a kitten who wants to hide in a dangerous place. A man says he’s been driving a stolen truck for one day, but he’s off by a few months.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A young couple spends too much time arguing and not enough time paying attention to the road. An officer uses his surefire trick to catch someone in a lie. A chatty driver racks up a slew of charges in front of his own house.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A suspect in possession of a stolen truck leads everyone on a chase through some bumpy terrain. Gas station employees call police when they spot a couple asleep at the pump. A man familiar to deputies shows them he can change.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A personalized keychain casts doubt on a man’s flimsy story. A cyclist throws something behind his back as soon as deputies roll up. A laid-back driver’s estimation of what’s in his car is off by a couple trash bags.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An alleged burglar claims his sack full of money is a gift from his grandma. The discovery of a pink bandana leads deputies to question a suspect’s story. A deputy attempts to get a man to cool off after a fight with his wife.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A deputy questions a driver about why his broken-down car looks like it’s been in an accident. Obstacle after obstacle prevents a woman from fixing her janky vehicle. A young man looking for a fresh start falls on hard times.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Two men acting strangely in a gas station draw the suspicion of an employee. Deputies arrest a man for creating an unsafe environment for his younger brother. Mom calls the cops when her daughter throws water on her.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: The rough terrain of a high-speed pursuit proves both dangerous and useful for deputies. Police find more than a stolen air conditioner in the trunk of a messy van. A confused man loses track of what’s in his pockets.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A runaway biker makes multiple clumsy attempts to slip away from deputies. A shady figure has a curious method of trying to get a drink of water. A young woman starts making unwise choices when her family leaves town.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man in possession of a stolen car explains his unique nickname to deputies. Police go to the same house twice in under 30 minutes to sort out a messy marital spat. A mom with multiple priors is caught in a bind.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A deputy tries to level with a man who’s struggled with addiction for a decade. Security guards at an aquarium warn officers about a man with a gun. A masked-up cyclist has no luck out-pedaling the officer on his tail.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: After leading police on a slow pursuit, a sharply-dressed driver has a heated talk with another deputy. In spite of her tears, police unravel a woman’s lies one-by-one. A traditionally bad omen turns into good luck for a couple.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Langston and Riley are taken hostage during the aftermath of a shootout in an usually calm Las Vegas community.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Langston is shocked when his former student is found murdered and becomes the focus of a CSI investigation into the world of Mexican wrestling.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Nick's case of a deceased skydiver takes an interesting turn when Catherine discovers there may be a connection between the skydiver and a mysterious double murder case.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: When Hodges and Wendy run into each other at a science fiction convention for one of their favorite classic television shows, they end up investigating the murder of one of their beloved actors.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Catherine revisits one of the very first cases she worked as a CSI when the convicted felon in the murder claims the verdict was based on faulty evidence.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: An unexplained illness that is affecting random citizens of Las Vegas baffles the CSIs.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A brutal motorcycle gang murder takes place in a biker bar.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A cache of missing chips from a closed down casino turn up in Vegas and a string of murders follow, leading Langston to use deadly force for the first time in his career as a CSI.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: When Sara unexpectedly returns, the CSI team come together to investigate the death of a famous young actress killed in a dubious traffic collision.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: When a porn producer and drug dealer are found dead in an upscale Vegas area, the CSIs focus their investigation on members of the neighborhood.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: When two office mates plot to rob a casino, their plan ends with the CSIs investigating a murder.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: When a policeman kills another officer, the CSIs must look to the evidence to determine if the shooting was premeditated or an accident.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: An entire college football team comes under investigation when their beloved coach is found murdered in his home.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Two seemingly unrelated crimes tracked by the CSIs turn out to be connected by a twisted plot of revenge.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Langston y Riley son tomados como rehenes después de un tiroteo en una comunidad normalmente tranquila de Las Vegas.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Un antiguo alumno de Ray es asesinado. La investigación les llevará hasta el mundo de la lucha libre mexicana.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: El caso de Nick sobre un paracaidista herido dará un giro cuando Catherine descubra que está relacionado con un caso de doble asesinato.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Cuando Hodges y Wendy se encuentran en una convención de ciencia ficción de uno de sus programas de televisión favoritos, terminan investigando el asesinato de uno de sus queridos actores.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Catherine revisa uno de los primeros casos en los que trabajó como CSI cuando el delincuente condenado por el asesinato afirma que el veredicto se basó en pruebas defectuosas.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Una enfermedad inexplicable que afecta a ciudadanos al azar de Las Vegas desconcierta a los CSI.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Un brutal asesinato por parte de una banda de motociclistas tiene lugar en un bar de motocicletas.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Un botín de fichas perdidas de un casino cerrado aparece en Las Vegas y le sigue una serie de asesinatos, lo que lleva a Langston a usar la fuerza letal por primera vez en su carrera como CSI.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Cuando Sara regresa inesperadamente, el equipo de CSI se une para investigar la muerte de una famosa joven actriz fallecida en un dudoso accidente de tránsito.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Cuando un productor de pornografía y un traficante de drogas son encontrados muertos en un área exclusiva de Las Vegas, el equipo de CSI centra su investigación en los miembros del vecindario.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Cuando dos compañeros de oficina conspiran para robar un casino, su plan termina con los CSI investigando un asesinato.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Cuando un policía mata a otro oficial, el CSI debe buscar las pruebas para determinar si el tiroteo fue premeditado o un accidente.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Todo un equipo de fútbol universitario es investigado cuando su querido entrenador es encontrado asesinado en su casa.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Cuando dos crímenes aparentemente diferentes resultan estar vinculados, los CSIs descubren que están entrelazadas parte de la trama.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A jury field trip to the scene of a murder flips the legal tables when the defendant ends up dead and the twelve jurors become the prime suspects.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A “Speed Dating” night for Miami singles turns deadly for one South Beach stud who finds himself on the wrong end of a tire iron.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Miami Beach is evacuated for a tsunami, but the CSI team remains after discovering a bank robbery plot while investigating a seemingly random murder.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A string of dead bodies, found off the coast of Miami, turns out to be the work of modern-day pirates. Horatio and the team investigate.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: An innocent man is killed when someone falls on him from a balcony. The CSI team is lead into the center of a high-level sex and murder scandal.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A seemingly random carjacking turns out to be anything but when a young woman's gambling addiction becomes more than the family business can support.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A hospital emergency room shootout investigation puts the CSI team in the middle of a murder case involving the leader of a prominent street gang

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A routine traffic stop ends in the murder of a patrolman. The CSI team must sort out a young girl's obsessive love affair in order to find the killer.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A "Friction Party" at a private suite in one of the city's hotels accommodating hundreds of cruise passengers leaves a young woman dead.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio faces a former nemesis who escaped his grasp once before, a case of stolen identity leads to murder, the question becomes "which one did it?"

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Florida's gator and snake-infested Everglades becomes ground zero for a number of unrelated murders just as fires engulf the rare eco-system.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Florida's gator and snake-infested Everglades becomes ground zero for a number of unrelated murders just as fires engulf the rare eco-system.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a small jet crashes into a residential neighborhood, the wreckage reveals a corpse in the cargo hold, along with a half-million dollars in cash.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The world of extreme skateboard videos turns deadly when the competition heats up inside the studio. Horatio and the CSI team investigate.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Cuando un tirador apunta al motel donde se aloja Delko, Horatio y el equipo de CSI deben investigar el pasado de Delko para encontrar al asesino.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: El equipo de CSI, con la ayuda de informantes locales, lucha para salvar un vecindario que está a punto de ser dominado por una violenta pandilla callejera.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio y el equipo de CSI usan tecnología radical para descubrir el secreto de la mente de un hombre cuando este aparece cubierto de sangre sin recordar dónde ha estado.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Cuando ocurre un asesinato durante una carrera de caballos, Horatio y el equipo de CSI descubren que Ryan tiene un vínculo personal con el caso.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Alexx Woods regresa a Miami cuando un asesino pone en peligro la vida de Calleigh y Ryan. Horatio y el equipo de CSI deben investigar.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio y el equipo de CSI enfrentan cara a cara a un abogado defensor que puede o no estar involucrado en el encubrimiento de un asesinato.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Cuando unos piratas se apoderan de un yate de lujo, el futuro de Delko como CSI se ve amenazado justo cuando su relación con Calleigh pasa al siguiente nivel.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: El equipo de CSI hace un descubrimiento impactante sobre su víctima de asesinato, mientras Horatio intenta salvar a su hijo de la conducta errática de Julia.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Cuando una azafata es asesinada en vuelo, Horatio Caine y el equipo de CSI descubren todos los trapos sucios de los viajes en avión.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Una violación de domicilio se vuelve mucho más que eso cuando Horatio Caine y el equipo de CSI descubren que son el blanco de la mafia rusa.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Cuando la vida de un niño inocente está en peligro, Ryan, a la larga, se ve obligado a traicionar a Horatio Caine y al resto del equipo de CSI.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Un caso de asesinato que involucra cirugía plástica extrema conduce a Horatio Caine hasta Ron Saris, que está vivo y busca vengarse de Julia.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Cuando una estrella de telerrealidad es asesinada, Horatio Caine y el equipo de CSI se adentran en el mundo escandaloso y sensual de un programa de televisión de citas.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio Caine y el equipo de CSI trabajan para averiguar por qué una familia aparentemente normal fue blanco de un brutal ataque con granadas.

programme.desc: Danny and Lindsay find popular chef Alec Green dead in the wine cellar of his trendy restaurant with a corkscrew dangling from his chest.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: A knight in shining armor impaled with a lance in central park and a businessman stabbed by an ice pick in a nearby hotel share a connection.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: A serial killer’s verdict overturned when Mac jails his arresting officer, but a victim surfaces sporting the killer’s signature.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Stella is forced to deal with painful memories when Det. Valens visits and says her DNA is connected to a Philadelphia cold case making her a suspect.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The CSIs are puzzled when evidence and witnesses point to John McEnroe as their murder suspect despite his air-tight alibi.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac, Stella, and Hawkes are forced to save the lab when a drug lord and his crew descend upon the CSI’s vault to retrieve their merchandise.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: A murder on the Statue of Liberty rattles New York City as the CSI team tries to catch the killer before he strikes again.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The CSI team investigates the death of a professional diver in relation to a rumor of sunken treasure in the New York Harbor.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The CSI team investigates a murder tied into a string of “spy” robberies targeting the elite while Mac continues to receive mysterious phone calls.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The CSI New York based team investigates the bizarre murder of a scientist, as well as the unusual death of a college girl.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The CSI team investigates a string of murders in New York that revolve around an online world, apparently performed by a hit man.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The CSIs investigate two eerie murders on Halloween; one, an apparent zombie attack, the other a faked murder/suicide in a house with a spooky past.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The CSI team works to solve two seemingly unrelated murders that after investigations are underway turn out to be connected.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The CSI team investigates crimes: one involving a model that was killed on a billboard in Times Square, and another centered around a robbery.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Un bien mayor (S5 Ep23)
programme.desc: Mac le informa a un ex convicto que cumplió condena por un crimen que no cometió y Anna le dice a Danny que es hora de que nazca el primer bebé del equipo de CSI.

programme.title: CSI: New York: La verdad me engaña (S5 Ep24)
programme.desc: Stella descubre que los neoyorquinos están siendo asesinados por artefactos griegos antiguos, ella entrega su placa para seguir una pista que la lleva a Grecia.

programme.desc: Hajime and his party departs the city of Erisen to head towards the Sunken Ruins of Melusine; they solve multiple puzzles to reach the labyrinth, and a mysterious illusion confronts them.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 1984, los bomberos de California habían combatido diez incendios provocados en tres semanas.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Los excursionistas cerca de Anchorage, Alaska, descubrieron un cuerpo envuelto en sábanas con bordes de costura naranja.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Después de dispararle a sus víctimas en la cabeza, el asesino limpió la escena, colocó la evidencia incriminatoria en una bolsa de plástico y la arrojó al río.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: La víctima era querida y exitosa, lo cual hace que la brutalidad del crimen sea más difícil de entender.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Un oficial de policía de Alaska encontró el cuerpo de una mujer mientras patrullaba de rutina un parque público.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: La policía obtiene una pista sobre una pareja que desapareció en el fin de semana del Día de los Caídos durante un robo en marcha. La evidencia que se encuentra resuelve el brutal crimen.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Tracey Frame, de 35 años, fue condenada por el asesinato de David Nixon en Abril del 2002 después de que él había planeado terminar su relación.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: La noticia del brutal asesinato de una azafata hizo que el hijo de una víctima que había sido asesinada cinco años antes se pusiera en contacto con la policía.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Después de una Convención de Filadelfia, 180 legionarios contraen síntomas similares a la neumonía y 29 de ellos mueren. La determinación de un científico ayuda a identificar la causa de esta enfermedad mortal.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Cuando un policía fuera de servicio murió de un disparo, sus colegas oficiales estaban determinados a resolver el crimen.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: El cuerpo de Leanne Tiernan, de 16 años, fue descubierto nueve meses después de su desaparición. Los científicos forenses encontraron pistas que pintaron un retrato virtual de su asesino.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Cuando se llama a la policía de las Grandes Llanuras por un cadáver, una verificación de antecedentes de la víctima los lleva a una extraña red de vagabundos sin hogar, subastas de ganado y cheques sin fondos.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Cuando una maestra dedicada y respetada desapareció, la policía tuvo que determinar si se había ido de vacaciones sin decírselo a nadie, o si era víctima de un juego sucio.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Un hombre rico y su esposa fueron atacados por tres hombres enmascarados fuera de su lujosa casa en Louisiana. A él le dispararon hasta causarle la muerte y a ella la obligaron a abrir la caja fuerte que tenían escondida.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En el 2004, la estudiante de enfermería Tamika Huston desapareció de su hogar en Spartanburg, Carolina del Sur. Una pista llevó a los detectives a su auto y encontraron una llave de una casa desconocida que podría ayudar a resolver el caso.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 2003, el adolescente de St. Cloud, Jason MacLennan, regresó a su casa después de una noche con amigos y descubrió el cuerpo de su padre tirado en un charco de sangre.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Se denuncia la desaparición de una mujer tras una pelea con su marido. La policía sospecha de un hombre que denunció un incendio en su automóvil. En el interior se encuentran dos diminutas gotas de sangre.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Encontrar al sospechoso
programme.desc: Los atentados con bombas son difíciles de resolver, porque el perpetrador no suele estar en la escena y la evidencia se esfuma.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En la víspera de Navidad de 2005, se encuentra el cuerpo de un hombre ardiendo cerca de Baltimore. Finalmente fue identificado como Wesley Person, de 26 años.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Dos hombres fueron asesinados mientras dormían en sus camas. La noche siguiente, un incendio provocó la destrucción de una clínica de planificación familiar.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Se descubrió un esqueleto humano en las marismas de Carolina del Norte y, cuando los investigadores descubrieron que había estado muerta durante 18 meses, sabían que sería difícil descubrir quién era, y mucho más quién la mató.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Acechado en la noche
programme.desc: Cuando una víctima es brutalmente asesinada en su propia cama, los investigadores encuentran una huella de zapato en el barro de afuera, evidencia física que esperan que conduzca al asesino.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Dentro de un cabello
programme.desc: Una mirada retrospectiva al caso del violador de River Park, que asaltó a cuatro mujeres en South Bend, Indiana, durante 1996. Los agentes del orden arrestaron a Richard Alexander, quien fue declarado culpable en 1998 y sentenciado a 70 años de prisión.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Los doctores del hospital no pudieron determinar la causa de las alucinaciones y el intenso dolor de Bobby Curley. Lo trataron como un trastorno neurológico pero su estado se deterioró. Él estaba siendo envenenado.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Después de que el sospechoso fuera declarado culpable de incendio premeditado y asesinato, mantuvo su inocencia pero fue sentenciado a 25 años de prisión.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Edward Post preparó un baño para su esposa antes de salir a correr. Regresó y la encontró sin respirar. Murió antes de que llegara la ambulancia. La policía consideró su muerte como accidental hasta que surgió un motivo.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Destinado a la cárcel
programme.desc: Una mujer es encontrada muerta en un barranco, pero las fuertes tormentas habían arrastrado pruebas cruciales de la escena del crimen. En dos ocasiones, el rastro se estancó.

programme.title: Walking with Monsters: Life Before Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Three hundred million years ago, the forests were ruled by insects. This was a world in which giant dragonflies battled with two-foot-wide spiders.

programme.title: Walking with Monsters: Life Before Dinosaurs
programme.desc: On the supercontinent Pangea, early therapsids, creatures more similar to mammals than reptiles, fight for survival alongside other animals. In the carboniferous swamps, insects and arthropods take over and grow into giants.

programme.title: How to Build a Dinosaur
programme.desc: Dinosaurs died out 65 million years ago and we have hardly ever found a complete skeleton. So how do we turn a pile of broken bones into a dinosaur exhibit? Dr Alice Roberts finds out how the experts put skeletons back together.

programme.title: Science of Walking With Beasts
programme.desc: This episode explains how the 120-million-year reign of the dinosaurs ended when mammals became the fastest and fiercest creatures on the planet.

programme.title: Science of Walking With Beasts
programme.desc: A look at the science that has proved Darwin's idea that intelligent, sophisticated humans have an ancestral connection with the ape.

programme.title: Horizon
programme.desc: Exploring Mongolia's Gobi Desert to determine whether dinosaurs exist in the present as birds. It is one of the harshest places on Earth with the biggest dinosaur graveyard.

programme.title: Horizon
programme.desc: Until recently most scientists thought they knew what killed off the dinosaurs. It was a 10 km-wide meteorite which smashed into Yucatan in Mexico.

programme.title: Horizon
programme.desc: Exploring the idea of human coexistence with dinosaurs. Had the species not disappeared from the face of earth ages ago, keeping them as pets could have been a possibility.

programme.title: Horizon
programme.desc: According to new evidence, the Woolly Mammoth went on roaming until about the time the Pyramids were built.

programme.title: Horizon
programme.desc: Are sparrows and blackbirds the direct descendents of a vicious group of dinosaurs including the velociraptor?

programme.title: Horizon
programme.desc: The earth split in India 66 million years ago in a disaster that may have caused the end of the dinosaurs.

programme.title: Prehistoric Autopsy
programme.desc: Anatomist Professor Alice Roberts and biologist Dr George McGavin go on an extraordinary evolutionary journey to meet our ancient ancestors. They start with our closest prehistoric relative, a Neanderthal.

programme.title: Prehistoric Autopsy
programme.desc: The team go back 1.5 million years to meet one of the earliest humans, Homo erectus. They walked the earth far longer than any other human species and were the first ancestors to look a lot like we do today.

programme.title: Prehistoric Autopsy
programme.desc: The team looks at probably the most famous of all our early ancestors. She is called Lucy from the species Australopithecus afarensis and she lived 3.2 million years ago. Lucy's species had traded life in the trees for life on the ground.

programme.title: Ice Age Giants
programme.desc: Discover the beasts of the Ice Age with Professor Alice Roberts. Alice's adventure begins in the Land of the Sabre-tooth.

programme.desc: A Pointer mix is fixated on pinecones, while an Australian shepherd whines every time his owner switches on the vacuum cleaner.

programme.desc: A terrier rescued via the Internet is a handful to manage and bites anyone who tries to touch his hindquarters; pit bull problems.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Hunting down a fugitive known as "Bozo," Dog gets help from an unexpected source, Bozo's father-in-law.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and the team get a big surprise after they track down Bosco, a fugitive who they believe is addicted to methamphetamines. They discover he's off drugs, settling into a normal life with a new girlfriend, and is very friendly.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Leland has a full plate of fugitives in Kona, and the whole family heads to the Big Island to help.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog visits his mother's grave for inspiration before heading out to find Frankie, a violent fugitive hiding in the jungle. The spirit of Ma Chapman seems to help when Dog finds an unusual ally; Frankie's mother.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog lectures high school students about the dangers of drugs before going after Joseph, a dangerous fugitive who won't be easy to capture.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog takes the day off to try his hand at coaching, and assigns Tim and Leland to track down a dangerous fugitive on their own. Can the boys prove they can handle it?

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: The boys get distracted by the bikini-clad lovelies on Waikiki when they hunt for Lucy, a homeless, alcoholic fugitive. Beth is amused by the boys, but this is serious business: Tim will have to pay the bond if Lucy isn't caught.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog faces a tough personal and professional situation when he must hunt down his friend, Ili, who has helped him on many busts. But now Ili's on the other side of the law, and now Dog must bring her in.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is out to make two grabs on two islands in one day. Part of the team is goes to Kona to nab a woman who skipped her court date. Meanwhile, Dog and the others hunt Patrick, a fugitive who's fighting in an Extreme Boxing event on the Big Island.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog has only a few days to catch a woman nicknamed Cats or forfeit Beth's $10,000 bond. But it won't be easy - Cats is eight months pregnant, so Dog will have to lure her in rather than risk a violent grab.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is in for a big surprise after he catches a fugitive named Jonaven in a sting operation.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and the team really have their hands full when they go after a tough guy named Nunu, who leads them on a chase through apartment complexes and a shopping mall before he's finally captured.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog's feeling lucky, so he's going to try to capture two women in one day. The first, Moani, has "crazy" tattooed on her neck and is facing drug charges. The second fugitive, Jade, who turns out to be a tough catch, despite help from Jade's sister.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog has problems when he goes to a small town on the Big Island of Hawaii to track down a fugitive. In a small town, everyone knows everyone else's business, making it impossible for Dog to hunt in secret.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and the team search for Jonah, a violent and desperate criminal facing?20 years in jail. The trail goes stale when Dog runs into evasive family members and an angry girlfriend.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and the team go after Kandice, AKA Candy, AKA Suga, a stripper who didn't make her court appearance. They convince one of her friends to lure her to a supermarket parking lot, where Dog has an easy time fetching the fetching young thing. But then

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and Beth take on the heartbreaking case of Rachel. Rachel's mom bailed her out of jail on condition that she go to AA meetings and stick to a curfew. But Rachel hasn't kept up her end of the bargain, and now her mother wants her back to jail.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is trying to cut down on smoking, but it's not easy with his high-stress job. Today, he must track down Walter, a fugitive who believes that the Canadian military has planted a chip in his teeth that allows him to communicate with his van.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Beth designs a luxurious new office for the team and shows it off to Dog, but the bounty hunter is more interested in starting his hunt for Federico, who's been revoked for missing court dates and generally running amuck.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog pursues two people whose lives have been ruined by drugs. First, he tracks Mae, who traded a good home and loving family for an ice pipe. The next case involves Jude. His addiction has caused his pregnant wife to fear for her safety.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is a rough, tough bounty hunter, but he's a softie at heart, as the two cases in this episode show.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: An assistant manager of a Florida steakhouse is stabbed to death. It appears to be a robbery gone wrong, but a bloody fingerprint reveals that he knew his killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A fire erupts in Kings Cross Station in London, killing 31 people and injuring dozens more. Investigators pinpoint the cause of the fire, but it takes state-of-the-art technology and fluid dynamics experts to explain why it became a deadly inferno.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When Chris Ochoa confessed to the 1988 rape and murder of Nancy DePriest, the case was closed. 8 years later, Achim Marino confessed to the same crime. Can DNA evidence identify the real perpetrator?

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A mother of two young children was found dead in her bedroom. Her death was ruled a suicide — but when investigators learned she had almost died in a house fire three years earlier, they decided to take another look at the evidence.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: It would take 46 years, handwriting analysis and new fingerprint technology to solve the 1957 murders of two California police officers.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When Washington, DC is plagued by a series of arson fires — each started with the same type of incendiary device — it's up to forensic scientists to find the clues that lay in the ashes.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: How did the stalker obtain the security system code for his victim's home? How did he steal her personal photographs? Police needed answers and they found them in the most unlikely of places.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1984, the body of college student Laura Salmon was found on a Middle Tennessee farm, covered with her own denim jeans as well as the jeans of the killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A Michigan State University grad student disappeared and was presumed dead. With the help of a professor of geological sciences, police hoped to get the "dirt" on her killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A mysterious computer crash pushed a thriving manufacturing company to the brink of collapse, jeopardizing hundreds of employees' jobs. Forensic investigators must determine if the crash was the result of a computer defect, human error or sabotage.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 2007, the Florida mobile home of Effie and Michael Ratley catches fire. Michael heroically rescues his wife and infant son. A month later, his wife is found beaten to death in a bedroom of his parents' home.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a college student is reported missing, police believe their investigation will be like countless others. But when they discover blood spatter in her boyfriend's bedroom, they know this case is going to be different.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: An infant is rushed to the emergency room with serious breathing problems. Within months, there are more than 30 similar cases. Can doctors find the cause and a cure?

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A surgeon is stabbed to death and the most likely suspect is seen in a restaurant at the time of the murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: This killer probably hoped to cover his tracks by staging the crime scene. But investigators saw through the attempt almost immediately and turned to forensic science to learn what really happened that night.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: They thought the fire would cover their crime. But one tiny clue, no bigger than a thumbtack, remained. It held all the information investigators needed to put a trio of cold-blooded killers behind bars.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: One investigator's quick thinking helps him capture a shoe impression made in snow before the evidence melts away. The shoe leads investigators to Peter Benedict and Frank Lanoue, who are convicted of aggravated assault and robbery.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Rachael Mullenix, 19, was convicted of stabbing her mother, Barbara Mullenix, in 2006. She allegedly packed her mother's bloodied corpse in a cardboard box before dumping it in California's Newport Bay.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1989, the dead bodies of Joan Rogers and her two teenage daughters were found floating in Tampa Bay.

programme.title: Forensic Files: Brotherhoods
programme.desc: Two men are murdered while sleeping in their beds. The next night, arson destroys a family planning clinic. Investigators wonder whether some shards of glass, paint chips and a chicken feather could link what appear to be two separate crimes.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: At the scene of a vicious murder, the killer went to a great deal of effort to wipe away his fingerprints and obscure his shoe impressions left when he tracked blood trails on the floor.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman is killed while walking her dogs in the woods. Since she has no enemies and her husband has an alibi, police assume it's a hunting accident — until they find a strange letter, allegedly written by the woman before her death.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 2006, Texas real estate agent Sarah Anne Walker was found brutally murdered in a model home. Weeks later, a witness came forward who may have seen the killer. Police used forensic hypnosis to help him recall every detail of the man's appearance.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Emergency dispatch received a call from a man who said his girlfriend shot and killed herself. The autopsy revealed that the gunshot wound was not self-inflicted, and the evidence on her body would give police a golden opportunity to catch her killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Janice Johnson was found dead at the foot of her basement stairs. Police in Nova Scotia had to unravel the circumstances surrounding Janice's death and answer the question: Was it an accident or murder?

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1999, 9-year-old Valiree Jackson vanished on her way to school near Spokane. Her father, Brad Jackson, reported the disappearance and the entire community started searching for her abductor.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The body of 16-year-old Leanne Tiernan was discovered nine months after she disappeared. Forensic scientists found clues that painted a virtual portrait of her killer.

programme.desc: Ricky begins wearing a hat around the apartment because he thinks he's going bald. Lucy thinks he's worrying needlessly but goes to a store that specializes in hair restoration in order to help Ricky feel better.

programme.title: I Love Lucy

programme.desc: Upset at Lucy's irresponsible spending, Ricky suggests she could change her ways if she had a job. Lucy and Ethel propose switching roles with their husbands for a week; they will get jobs if the men stay home to do all the housework.

programme.desc: Ricky and his band are going on a tour and Lucy wants to go too. She dusts off her old saxophone and goes down to the club dressed in a zoot suit to audition for a spot.

programme.desc: The Ricardos' eleventh wedding anniversary is coming up and Ricky doesn't seem to be picking up the none-too-subtle hints Lucy is giving. She doesn't realize that Ricky has already made plans to buy a string of pearls at a discount from their neighbor.

programme.desc: After seeing Fred use a pair of trick handcuffs, Lucy uses a similar pair to attach herself to Ricky as gag. She wants him to stay at home and not go to a rehearsal for a live TV show the next day.

programme.desc: El Noruego cansado de que todo mundo lo busque solo por su dinero busca a Pitipú para que le ayude a idear un plan, mientras que Peluzín se embarca en el mundo de la robótica.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Ortega se va unos días a vivir con Jonathan y esto crea un conflicto con Olaf, mientras Irmita espera la visita de su prima a quien le esconde un gran secreto.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El edificio Pino es desalojado por causas de fuerza mayor y todos tienen que buscar donde vivir, mientras que el Abuelo se deja caer en una espiral descendente debido a su gran ego.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego está despilfarrando su fortuna peor que nunca, mientras que Pitipú, Don Sebas y Gaspar buscan solucionar el problema de plomería del edificio Pino.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego busca desesperadamente una forma para recuperar su fortuna, mientras que el Abuelo se hace adicto al videojuego de moda.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego todavía no puede asimilar que perdió toda su fortuna, mientras que el Abuelo malaconseja a Peluzín de cómo pagar la renta atrasada de su departamento.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Irma organiza un club de peleas clandestinas, mientras que Pitipú decepcionado de sus conocimientos Bíblicos, decide embarcarse en el camino del mal.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Pitipú busca ayudar a Don Sebas con su problema de peso, mientras que Peluzín y el Noruego buscan aprovecharse de un afamado cantante del edificio.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Un extraño virus se empieza a propagar, infectando a todos en el edificio, mientras que el Abuelo y Jonathan buscan revivir a Irmita después de que Peluzín la deja en coma.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El colegio organiza un viaje todo pagado a Acapulco para reforzar la relación "Padres e Hijos", y todos buscan colarse a esa vacación, así tengan hijos o no. Al final la vacación no resulta como esperaban.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego descubre por accidente que cuenta con poderes mentales y decide aprovecharlos para su conveniencia, mientras que el Diablo sube del inframundo para buscar un nuevo asistente en Peluzín.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Abuelo sufre un accidente y es llevado de emergencia al hospital pero no es posible la operación. Deciden esperar a que se cure solo, llevándose una sorpresa. Mientras tanto, Olaf decide pedirle ayuda escolar a Jonathan y termina por aprovecharse.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego está cansado de la mala racha que ha tenido con las mujeres y busca el consejo de Pitipú, mientras que Peluzín le pide ayuda a Jonathan para poder encontrar a su verdadero padre.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Mientras que el Abuelo está vuelto loco por encontrar su revista favorita, Peluzín desentierra la verdad sobre su verdadera familia.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Olaf se lleva una sorpresa muy desagradable al estar instalando su altar de muertos, mientras que el Abuelo se burla de Gaspar frente a toda su oficina lo que ocasiona una guerra entre ambos.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Peluzín trata de averiguar el paradero de su madre con la ayuda de sus dos nuevos papás, mientras que Gaspar invita al Abuelo, el Noruego y Johnny a el nuevo restaurante de moda.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Abuelo y Peluzín buscan lucran aprovechando el próximo paro de agua en la ciudad, mientras que el Noruego nos revela por fin después de tanto tiempo el porque de su miedo al baño.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Los Lambreton son los encargados de organizar la fiesta navideña de este año en su casa, mientras que Don Sebas extraña a su país natal y piensa en regresar.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Abuelo despierta la curiosidad en el Noruego por conocer a su padre y este le pide ayuda a Gaspar para que lo acompañe en esta misión que ha hecho como su única prioridad. Mientras tanto el Abuelo encamina a Jonathan en su despertar sexual.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Viendo la tele en la sala de su casa de repente el Abuelo y el Noruego son golpeados con una nueva idea para lucrar en un popular programa de TV. Mientras tanto Peluzín se aventaja de un descuido de Gaspar.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Abuelo sufre un accidente y mientras esta al filo de la muerte revalora su vida desde sus inicios recordando una parte de su infancia, la que busca esclarecer una vez recuperada su salud.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Abuelo se topa de manera inesperada con su Némesis de la infancia y junto con Gaspar se embarca en una cruzada para recuperar un objeto muy preciado de manos de su archienemigo.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Este capitulo completo es una sátira de la típica historia de telenovelas que ha puesto a México en el mapa como el mas su fuerte exponente, sin reflejar necesariamente algún estándar de calidad.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego recibe una visita inesperada con una noticia que le cambiara la vida. Mientras tanto Jonathan le ayuda a Peluzín para prepararse para una prueba muy importante.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Una aparición religiosa se manifiesta en el baño del departamento y poco tardan el noruego y el abuelo en encontrarle una ventaja a esta situación.

programme.title: David Bowie: Out of This World

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #21: The Last Job
programme.desc: Lupin and his companions have their sights on a Japanese cultural treasure, a priceless Buddha statue. But when a mysterious group of ninja thieves get the jump on them, it might just be the gang's last job!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Fujiko Mine, the devastatingly sexy lady thief who'll stop at nothing to make her steal, has her sights set on a religious cult's secret treasure when a new man waltzes into her life: Lupin III.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: A war is going down between the Italian and Chinese Mafias, and Fujiko ends up in the middle of it. A mysterious bodyguard named Daisuke Jigen stands at the heart of the matter, but who knows whose side he's really on?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: She's always getting in trouble / But she may give you a square deal / She's always sharing everything / Except for every steal / Even a lowly samurai / Is quick to see the appeal / How do you solve a problem like Fujiko Mine?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: The famous diva Aiyan's bejeweled mask has been targeted by Lupin the Third, and Zenigata determines to "set a thief to catch a thief." Who will get to the mask first: Fujiko or Lupin?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Using her womanly wiles, Fujiko convinces Lupin to retrieve the legendary Laughing Peacock from an Egyptian pyramid. However, the seemingly simple job turns into a fierce race when Jigen sets his sights on the treasure too.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Fujiko infiltrates a Catholic girls' school and sets about stealing all the maidens' hearts to pave the way for an even bigger theft. But Oscar knows exactly what she's up to, and he's got a plan to stop her.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: The nation of Carib is in political upheaval, and Fujiko is in the thick of the action, naturally. What is she doing posing as a reporter? Will revolutionary Philadel Kest win her heart where Lupin has failed? And what is Goemon doing on that fighter jet?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: A fortune-teller supposedly able to predict his clients' deaths is for some reason seeking out Lupin's prior victims and giving them some very disturbing readings. What's the connection to Fujiko Mine, and how far will she go to see this job through?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Magical realism plus human trafficking plus Lupin and Daisuke Jigen plus a spa vacation plus Fujiko off the deep end equals... Well, you'll just have to find out.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Count Almeida has a job for Lupin, and he's not about to take no for an answer. When Lupin and Zenigata both separately make their way to the Count's villa seeking answers, the trail of clues leads to a ghost town with just one inhabitant.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: A recent string of particularly flashy thefts has been tied to Fujiko Mine, who seems to have taken to sending written warnings to the police just like Lupin does. But if you ask Inspector Zenigata, something smells fishy about the whole thing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Oscar's body is missing, girls are being kidnapped all over the world, and Lupin still hasn't made good on his threat to steal Fujiko Mine. There's only one thing to do: It's time to pay a visit to one Count Luís Yu Almeida.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: In the season finale, all the players have finally come together, and it's time to see how the tale ends.

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Good-Bye Partner"
programme.desc: When Zenigata is arrested for suspicion of being part of the Lupin gang, Lupin is talked into stealing Time Crystal to prove Pops' innocence.

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Blood Seal of the Eternal Mermaid"
programme.desc: The Mermaid's Scale is a mysterious aquamarine gemstone that Lupin has been hired to steal it... but it turns out to be a forgery. Now, he needs to find the real jewel before it can be used to destroy the whole world!

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Prison Of The Past"
programme.desc: When the Lupin gang hears the news that Finnegan Corbett, fondly referred to the 'Modern Day Robin Hood', is finally set to be executed, they travel to Kingdom of Dorrente to break him loose…

programme.desc: Luffy’s crew encounters treacherous birds and man-eating foliage on its desert odyssey, and just when they think the coast is clear, a great disturbance emerges from beneath the sand!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Straw Hats cross paths with the Barbar Sand Pirates, and Ace runs into big trouble when he gets separated from the group.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Princess Vivi devises a plan to test the hearts of a gang of so-called rebels. They talk a good game, but will their bite measure up to their bark?

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Straw Hats continue their journey to Yuba, where a bittersweet reunion with a childhood friend awaits Princess Vivi.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Fire Fist Ace is hired by two young boys to hunt down and capture a lethal bounty hunter known only as the Scorpion.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Chopper, Zoro, and Luffy get separated from the others. When the heat makes Luffy act even stranger than usual, his friends wonder if they joined the right pirate gang.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The assassins of Baroque Works gather at Spider’s Café, and the Straw Hats arrive at Yuba only to find it buried in sand.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Crocodile reveals himself to the Baroque Works assassins and discloses his dastardly plan for Alabasta. After departing Yuba, Luffy takes a stand that forces Vivi to rethink her mission.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Vivi takes Luffy’s advice, and the Straw Hats head towards Rainbase for a confrontation with Crocodile. Karoo finally reaches the palace with Vivi’s warning for King Cobra.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy leads a daring – but foolish – raid on Crocodile’s casino. His poor planning lands him behind bars with Captain Smoker – and more importantly, leaves Vivi unprotected.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: While the Straw Hats are stuck in the clink, King Cobra addresses the starving people of Nanohana. Will his unbelievable revelation drive his subjects past the brink of rebellion?

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: A royal imposter has the rebel army hell-bent on bringing Cobra’s reign to a violent end. Meanwhile, Luffy and his mates find themselves in deep trouble and even deeper water.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Sanji shows up in the nick of time to make the crocs cough up the key to Luffy’s freedom, but the ravenous reptiles spit up something else instead.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Crocodile snatches Vivi off the back of a giant crab, but Luffy’s not having it. The rubber-man goes toe-to-toe with the sandman in a battle that will end in bloodshed.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Crocodile puts Luffy down for a never-ending dirt nap, and the Straw Hats get a lift from a crabby ally in their race to stop the looming rebellion.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Vivi arrives in Alubarna with just enough time to stop the rebellion, but the agents of Baroque Works lurk in every corner, waiting to sabotage her plans for peace.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Sanji buys Vivi some time by mixing it up with a foe of many faces. Outside Alubarna’s walls, Chopper and Usopp tangle with Miss Merry Christmas and her slugging sidekick.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Usopp finally shows some courage by using a five-ton hammer to play whack-a-mole with Miss Merry Christmas. He may be bluffing, but the distraction lets Chopper zero in on the enemy’s weakness.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Chopper’s Rumble Ball could be the difference between life and death in the mole ballgame. Elsewhere, Sanji has trouble kicking a pretty enemy, and Vivi proposes something unthinkable.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Vivi continues preparations to blow up the palace; Zorro puts his steel to the test against a lethal blade-man; Sanji tries to overcome his inability to kick a foxy lady!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Things don’t look good for the prettiest Straw Hat. Nami’s about to tangle with a thorny adversary, and the weapon Usopp built her is only good for party tricks!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Crocodile reveals his sinister motives for attacking Alabasta, and Nami tries to end her duel with Miss Doublefinger by unleashing the Clima Tact’s ultimate weapon: a devastatingly lethal tornado!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Zoro hopes to attain a new level of strength when he fights a foe with a body made of blades. The Straw Hat sword-slinger is determined to become a man who can cut steel – or die trying.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Koza – the leader of the rebel army – finally discovers the evil mastermind behind Alabasta’s drought, but is he too late to prevent further bloodshed?

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: When Koza is mysteriously shot, the rebellion is reborn, but Vivi’s cries for a cease-fire fall on deaf ears until a long-overdue hero swoops to the rescue!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy finally discovers the secret to knocking out a sandman, but it won’t matter unless Vivi and the rest of the Straw Hats can locate the Baroque Works bomber.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: While his mates search for a bomb, Luffy narrowly survives his second scrape with Crocodile. Across town, Nico Robin strong-arms Cobra into revealing his country’s greatest secret.

programme.desc: A young woman disappears, leaving the community hoping for her safe return; when she is found murdered, a string of mysterious anonymous tips takes detectives into a toxic world of jealousy and obsession.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: The wife of a Marine, a pregnant dominatrix and a sex slave cross paths in a twisted tale of kidnapping, lies and murder.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood

programme.title: American Pickers

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: With Frank too sick to go picking, Mike's brother Robbie scrambles to fill in at the last minute for the trip. In Idaho, the guys find a barn-sized man cave filled with an awesome collection of Western Americana.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: Frank goes wild in Joe's garage. It's packed with vintage motorcycles and while Frank scores deal after deal, Mike's efforts sputter and stall. With his family hit hard by the recession, a prolific collector is eager to sell.

programme.desc: A garage door in Indiana leads to a 1950s wagon Mike can't leave without--if he can sweeten the deal.

programme.title: Los herederos del monte
programme.desc: Julieta le revela su verdad a Juan y le anuncia el cáncer mortal del que sufre, en medio de una escena de celos para alejarlo de los besos de Paula. Emilio está preocupado por las acciones de sus hijos, sobre todo de Gaspar y José.

programme.title: Los herederos del monte
programme.desc: Juan sufre por su esposa. Los hermanos se dan cuenta de la enfermedad de Julieta. José discute con Paula, le dice que se vaya. Lupe escucha todo y le advierte a Gaspar que no confié en José. Emilio confiesa que uno de sus hijos es de su sangre.

programme.title: Los herederos del monte
programme.desc: El cáncer de Julieta separa a Juan y Paula definitivamente. El dolor de esa noticia hiere a una familia que apenas comienza su agonía. Emilio siente remordimiento por todo lo malo que hizo en su pasado y que afectó a cada uno de sus hijos.

programme.title: Los herederos del monte
programme.desc: Julieta le exige a Juan sacar a Paula de su casa, todo bajo la condición de hacer su tratamiento. José es víctima de su ambición bajo el juego de su padre. Rosario continúa cambiando por el recuerdo de su violación y se torna agresiva.

programme.title: La patrona
programme.desc: Guerra siente que Verónica está interesada en su hijo. La desaparición de Gertrudis tiene a los Lobos preocupados. La psiquiatra cae en manos de Verónica Dantés. Ramón está muy arrepentido por la muerte del Tigre Suárez y desea contar la verdad.

programme.title: La patrona
programme.desc: Los Lobos quieren saber dónde se metió Gertrudis. Verónica niega que esté en la Fortaleza, pero la tiene encerrada en el sótano de su casa. Verónica Dantés aprovecha un beso de Alejandro para cortarle un mechón de pelo para la prueba de ADN.

programme.title: La patrona
programme.desc: Alejandro daría lo que le queda de vida por volver a ver a Gabriela. Siente que Verónica besa como ella. Ramón cuenta que Antonia mandó a matar al Tigre y asegura que Alberto hizo detonar la mina. Alejandro y Lucho pelean por el amor de Verónica.

programme.title: La patrona
programme.desc: Verónica besa a Lucho y logra mantenerlo a su lado. Ante la insistencia de Alejandro, ella le dice que está comprometida con Lucho. Irene le cuenta a su hermana que Alejandro y Verónica son amantes. Max pierde el trabajo por defender a Valentina.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Dínora y su familia van a la hacienda Elizondo, Norma lo toma como una provocación. Los matones le aseguran a su patrona que Juan es un hombre fuerte y difícil, pero ella los amenaza.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Juan le dice a Dínora que está dispuesto a rogar con tal de obtener su libertad, ella no le cree. Hortencia ve a Ruth, piensa que es Libia, corre y da gritos, en el pueblo piensan que enloqueció.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Ruth sueña que Libia le muestra la cabaña donde tienen a Juan, sale a buscar el lugar, los hombres de Dínora la atrapan en el momento en que están cavando una tumba para enterrarlo.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Ruth y Juan toman a Dínora de rehén y huyen, pero son recapturados y llevados a la montaña para matarlos, sus hermanos merodean por los alrededores. Rosario y Armando tienen un duelo a tiros.
