programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Fester is so smitten upon receipt of a photo of his love, a bearded carnival lady, that he borrows stamp money to mail her a proposal. Morticia dons a beard and poses as the mother to convince Fester that he will have to work to support a wife.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Because she thinks Fester (Jackie Coogan) and Grandmama (Blossom Rock) are spoiling the children, Morticia (Carolyn Jones) hires a governess. Insulted, Fester paints a white line down the center of the Addams house, dividing it in half.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez see Fester conferring with TV muscleman Jack LaGrann (Jack LaLanne), and think that Fester is planning a television career. However, Uncle Fester confides to Lurch that he has to go on a secret diet and exercise.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez find Grandfather Pegleg's treasure map and summon Captain Grimby. They hope to charter his boat for the treasure hunt. But after meeting the Captain, Morticia is careful to keep the nature of the mission secret.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Ophelia Frump is madly in love with Horatio Bartholomew, the man who has everything, except the truth about her relatives. Morticia, not convinced by Bartholomew, persuades playboy Cousin Itt to stir the embers of his past romance with Ophelia.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Pugsley shocks his parents when he gives up his new atomic reactor as kid stuff and announces that he wants to find his own job. His first try is as a medical assistant to Dr. Bird. He turns up, scalpel in hand, ready to help during an operation.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Grandma Frump (guest star Margaret Hamilton), comes to the mistaken conclusion that her daughter, Morticia (Carolyn Jones), and Gomez (John Astin) plan to pack her off to an old folks home. Actually, they plan to send her to a beauty farm.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia, in order to be part of the National Beautification Program, decides to become a home decorator and offers her services to the neighbors. Next door neighbor, and insurance agent, Joe Digby hires Morticia in hopes of selling them insurance.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Ophelia taunts Uncle Fester into announcing that he is going to join the Peace Corps. Fester feels he's a cinch to be accepted because Gomez plans to pull strings in Washington on his behalf. The entire family agrees to help him study for the exam.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Allyn Joslyn guest-stars as Sam Hilliard, a former truant officer who now heads a private school where Wednesday and Pugsley are enrolled. When Hilliard breaks under the strain of dealing with the Addams children, Gomez buys the school.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Dr. Marvin P. Gunderson is summoned to examine Kitty Kat, the ailing lion pet of the Addams Family. Morticia decides that it is the doctor who needs help. To build his confidence, human members of the family pretend to be ill so he can effect cures.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's concern that Lurch is overworked leads Gomez to the operating table to assemble a custom-built secondary butler. Lurch lets the robot do all the work and then begins to feel that he isn't needed anymore.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Uncle Fester incinerates the family's stuffed bear with his flamethrower, Morticia reports the accident to the insurance company. Mr. Henson the head of the company, sends his assistant, Mr. Digby, to handle the case.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch suffers from unrequited love over Tiny Trivia (guest star Diane Jergens), Morticia's visiting school chum who only has eyes for show business. The entire family decides to try to turn their stolid butler into a new personality.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Ophelia laments that she has been jilted, Morticia suggests a career as an alternative to marriage. She tries chemistry first (with explosive results) then turns to operatic singing. Cousin Itt is summoned to coach her to stardom.

programme.title: Halloween With The New Addams Family
programme.desc: America's first family of ghastly giddiness reunites for a Halloween celebration that will raise the…dead! John Astin, Carolyn Jones, Ted Cassidy, Jackie Coogan, Lisa Loring and Ken Weatherwax all reprise their roles from the hit original series!

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez decide to keep Wednesday and Pugsley home from school after Morticia sees the fairy tales they have to read. When the truant officer comes to investigate, he is shocked at what he finds.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia calls a psychiatrist after she fears Pugsley is becoming normal after he abandons his pet octopus for a puppy and is seen wearing a Boy Scout uniform, playing with a baseball bat, and helping an old lady cross the street.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester, who has become lonely, convinces Gomez and Morticia that it is time for him to find a bride. He decides to put an ad in the newspaper, looking for love. But things go awry when a door-to-door saleswoman comes by.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Election fever grips the Addams household, as Gomez (John Astin) supports the council candidate whose campaign promise is to drain the town's disgusting bogs. Morticia (Carolyn Jones), who likes "the lovely bogs," labels the candidate an extremist.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Pugsley and Wednesday start a row at a party when their gift of a tarantula upsets Harold, the birthday boy. Harold's parents insist that the Addams children lack breeding and, therefore, are no longer allowed to play with their son.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: After Pugsley befriends Gorgo, a circus gorilla, Gorgo decides to follow Pugsley and Gomez home, where is accepted as one of the family. But Gorgo gives Morticia's tea guests, the Ladies League members, quite a shock.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: A pair of bank robbers are welcomed as Halloween trick-or-treaters by Morticia and Gomez. The creepy atmosphere of the house, Morticia's smoldering holiday punch, and Lurch's ominous presence impel the crooks to abandon their plans.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Lionel Barker, a former suitor of Morticia's, shows up, Gomez is jealous. But he's soon calmed when he learns that Barker is after Mildred, the new maid. The Addamses then discover that Barker is a con man--after Mildred's money, not her love.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Newlyweds move in next door. But the honeymoon loses its tranquility when Uncle Fester enters their house through a tunnel and they flee in terror at the sight of Lurch, Grandmama sharpening her ax, and Morticia and Gomez bathing the octopus.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The final three teams race to Long Island, New York where, after five continents, 10 countries, and more than 34,000 miles, one will be crowned winner and awarded the $1 million prize.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: In a series first, 11 new teams of social media stars depart from their own homes all across the country and head for Mexico City, where they set off fireworks and dig deep at an archaeological Roadblock. .

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: For the first time ever, the Race travels to Colombia where Racers go mud-diving for emeralds in a volcano.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The race continues in Columbia, where claustrophobia could prevent a racer from going deep into the catacombs to retrieve their next clue.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: When teenagers are driven to kill, their victims are but the first to fall. In three such cases, the families of the killers, as well as their communities, become the victims of violent crime.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Killers often attempt to deflect attention away from their crimes by hiding the remains of their victims. Bodies may lay hidden for years before they are discovered.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: For homicide investigators, it's a race against time as they track their deadliest foe: a serial killer for whom killing is the only way to feel alive.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: When a murder is committed and deceit clouds the evidence, investigators turn to science and technology to uncover the truth and expose a murderous lie and capture the killer.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Ballistic analysis is the key to finding killers who turn guns on their victims. Each shot fired leaves its own “fingerprint”, allowing scientists to target murderers with deadly aim.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: For the forensic entomologist, the insects that nest in dead bodies are like tiny witnesses to a crime.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Explosives Investigations: The crime lab is the place where science meets murder. In New York State, Eleanor Fowler opened a small package, which as mailed to her home. When she lifted the lid the box exploded killing her instantly.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Some people will let nothing stand between them and their goals. In their tortured minds, raw desire replaces all reason, and homicide becomes a convenient means to an end.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Drowning deaths often look like accidents and water can destroy the scant clues the killer may have left behind. Investigators must turn to forensic science to solve cases where the victim is found dead in the water.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Forensic psychologists delve into the minds of serial killers, explaining why, most often, they can be a friendly neighbor or the tenacious co-worker – the one who hides his or her dark side better than anyone else.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Black Boxes: Little evidence is left after an airplane takes a deadly plunge from the sky. Investigators' best hope for an answer comes from the flight data recorder known as a “black box.”

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: George Orwell's concept of Big Brother remains in the realm of fiction. But as technology becomes more a part of our lives, it's becoming increasingly more difficult to make a move without leaving behind an electronic trace.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: In criminal investigations, a simple clue can provide the missing link by placing a suspect at a crime scene. Dirt left on shoes, tires or clothes, or even a tiny piece of plastic can pinpoint a crime scene.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Drug trafficking has spawned a violent and deadly criminal underground. It's providing a challenge to forensic investigators devoted to cracking drug rings.

programme.title: Top Rank Classics
programme.desc: On December 17th, 2021, Artur Beterbiev and Marcus Browne fought at The Bell Centre in Montreal for IBF & WBC World Light Heavyweight titles.

programme.title: Artur Beterbiev vs Oleksandr Gvozdyk
programme.desc: On October 18th, 2019, Artur Beterbiev fought Oleksandr Gvozdyk for the WBC and IBF Light Heavyweight Titles at Liacouras Center in Philadelphia. Beterbiev put on the pressure late, scoring three knockdowns in the 10th round in a TKO victory.

programme.title: Top Rank Classics
programme.desc: On June 9th, 2020, a young Shakur Stevenson fought Felix Caraballo in a super featherweight bout in The Bubble at MGM Grand. After knocking down Caraballo in rounds 1 and 6, Stevenson would get the KO with a devastating body shot in round six.

programme.title: Top Rank Classics
programme.desc: On April 20th, 2019, Shakur Stevenson fought Chris Diaz for the IBF and WBO NABO Featherweight Titles at Madison Square Garden in New York. Stevenson outclassed Diaz with his class and precision earning a unanimous decision victory.

programme.title: Top Rank Classics
programme.desc: On October 31st, 2020 Naoya Inoue faced Jason Moloney in The Bubble at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas for the IBF and WBA World Super Bantamweight titles ending in a knockout in the 7th round by Inoue.

programme.title: Aaron Pryor vs Alexis Arguello
programme.desc: On November 12th, 1982, Aaron Pryor fought Alexis Arguello for the WBA World Light Welterweight Title at the Orange Bowl in Miami. Despite Arguello being the favorite, Pryor stopped Arguello in the 14th round in The Ring's Fight of the Decade.

programme.title: Tyson Fury vs Otto Wallin
programme.desc: On September 14th, 2019, Tyson Fury fought Otto Wallin for the Lineal Heavyweight Championship at T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas. Despite sustaining a severe cut above his eye early on, Fury prevailed and emerged victorious with an unanimous decision.

programme.title: Vasiliy Lomachencko vs Anthony Crolla
programme.desc: On April 12th, 2019 Vasiliy Lomachenko fought Anthony Crolla for the WBA and WBO World Lightweight title at the Staples Center in Los Angeles with Crolla down in round 3 and a count waived with California rules it finished as a knockout victory for Loma

programme.title: Vasiliy Lomachenko vs Richard Commey
programme.desc: On December 11th, 2021 Vasiliy Lomachenko faced Richard Commey for the vacant WBO Inter-continental lightweight title at Madision Square Garden in New York with Commey going down in round 7 the bout ended in a unanimous decision victory for Loma.

programme.title: Vasiliy Lomachenko vs Roman Martinez
programme.desc: On June 11th, 2016 Vasiliy Lomachenko battled Roman Martinez for the WBO World Super Featherweight title at Madison Square Garden in New York with Martinez going down and counted out in round 5 out of 12 resulting in a knockout victory for Loma.

programme.title: Vince Phillips vs Kostya Tszyu
programme.desc: On May 31st, 1997, Vince Phillips fought Kostya Tszyu for the IBF Junior Welterweight Title in Atlantic City. In an incredible back-and-forth battle, Phillips pulled off a shocking and emotional upset over Tszyu with an impressive 10th round TKO win.

programme.title: Vinny Pazienza vs Roberto Duran 1
programme.desc: On June 25th, 1994 Vinny Pazienza faced Roberto Duran for the first time at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas in a 12 round bout Pazienza went down in round 5 and Duran won this fight by unanimous decsion.

programme.title: Shakur Stevenson vs Oscar Valdez
programme.desc: On April 30th, 2022, Shakur Stevenson fought Oscar Valdez for the WBC and WBO World Super Featherweight Titles at MGM Grand in Las Vegas. Shakur put on a brilliant performance, outmatching Valdez on his way to a clear unanimous decision victory.

programme.title: Shakur Steveson vs Felix Caraballo
programme.desc: On June 9th, 2020, a young Shakur Stevenson fought Felix Caraballo in a super featherweight bout in The Bubble at MGM Grand. After knocking down Caraballo in rounds 1 and 6, Stevenson would get the KO with a devastating body shot in round six.

programme.title: Shane Mosley vs Antonio Margarito
programme.desc: On January 24th, 2009 Shane Mosley and Antonio Margarito fought for WBA Super World Welterweight title at the Staples Center in Los Angeles with what was supposed to be a 12 round bout only went nine resulting in a victory for Mosley.

programme.title: Shane Mosley vs Oscar De La Hoya
programme.desc: On June 17th, 2000 Shane Mosley faced Oscar De la Hoya for the first time for the IBA and WBC World welterweight titles at the Staples Center in Los Angeles the bout went a full 12 rounds ending with a split decision win for Mosley.

programme.desc: Landmine tries to adjust to life on Earth while recovering from the injury Starscream's null cannons inflicted on him.

programme.title: Transformers Beast Wars

programme.desc: As the Autobots do battle at the Earth's core, Jack learns more about Optimus' past on Cybertron.

programme.title: Transformers: Prime
programme.desc: Optimus Prime and the Autobots investigate the return of the Decepticons while forced to account for a group of young humans who unwittingly become involved in their eons-old conflict.

programme.title: Transformers: Prime
programme.desc: When a weak life signal is received from Cliffjumper, the Autobots roll out and are met by newly-returned Megatron who has obtained a mysterious and powerful substance... Dark Energon!

programme.title: Transformers: Prime
programme.desc: Bulkhead is on a mission to rescue Agent Fowler, who has been kidnapped by the Decepticons. Complications arise when Miko secretly tags along.

programme.title: Transformers: Prime
programme.desc: Utilizing the Dark Energon, Megatron summons an army of undead warriors to battle Optimus, while the other Autobots launch a high-stakes rescue onboard the Decepticon warship.

programme.title: Transformers: Prime
programme.desc: The ultimate showdown unfolds in Earth's orbit as the Decepticons, aided by Megatron's undead army, do battle with the Autobots with the fate of the Earth hanging in the balance.

programme.title: Transformers: Prime
programme.desc: While Optimus Prime and Bumblebee square off against Skyquake, Starscream encounters challenges to his leadership at every turn.

programme.title: Transformers: Prime
programme.desc: Bulkhead, Bumblebee and Ratchet scramble to eliminate a swarm of Scraplets that have invaded Autobot base while Optimus and Arcee patrol in the Arctic.

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: To aid in their latest scheme, The Decepticons kidnap a scientist. When Autobot Powerglide embarks on a high-altitude mission to save her, they form a bond that will keep his spirits flying high... even in the middle of a Decepticon fight.

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: It's Decepticon versus Decepticon when triple changers Astrotrain and Blitzwing decide to seize power. Using a molecule-freezing device to take Megatron and Starscream out of the picture, the two are free to lead how they see fit.

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: An S.O.S. seeking help from the Autobots arrives from the desperate people of the planet Traal, who have been forced into slave labor by Deceptitron. Seaspray arrives with the Autobots rescue team, and discovers much more than he was planning on.

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: Part 1 of 2. Megatron creates a powerful strike team, but his Stunticons lack sentience and independent thought. This leads the Decepticons deep into the heart of Cybertron to steal Vector Sigma, the computer that brought life to those on the planet.

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: Part 2 of 2. Attempting to even the odds against the Stunticons, the Autobots create the Aerialbots to join in the battle against Megatron, who plans to use Vector Sigma to turn the Earth into a metal planet like Cybertron!

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: Robots are truly in disguise when the Autobots pose as Stunticons to uncover Megatron's latest plan involving the thefts of some high-profile materials.

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: The Autobots participate in a charity road race to watch over an experimental race car—a car made of a special type of material Megatron needs to complete his latest doomsday weapon, a weather-dominating device capable of mass destruction.

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: The Autobots participate in a charity road race to watch over an experimental race car - a car made of a special type of material Megatron needs to complete his latest doomsday weapon, a weather-dominating device capable of mass destruction.

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: The Aerialbots are thrown back in time to Cybertron's Golden Age. While there, they learn the truth of Megatron's early treachery as well as witness firsthand the creation of Cybertron's greatest hero, Optimus Prime!

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: Megatron becomes infected with cosmic rust, a metal-consuming plague. When Autobot scientist Perceptor is forced to find a cure for Megatron, the entire Autobot civilization is again put at risk of extinction. But an Autobot invention may save them...

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: WOW - Women Of Wrestling ("WOW") showcases supreme athleticism, dramatic and inspiring stories, and is centered around empowering and uplifting women that are branded the "WOW Superheroes."

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: WOW - Women Of Wrestling ("WOW") showcases supreme athleticism, dramatic and inspiring stories, and is centered around empowering and uplifting women that are branded the "WOW Superheroes."

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: WOW - Women Of Wrestling ("WOW") showcases supreme athleticism, dramatic and inspiring stories, and is centered around empowering and uplifting women that are branded the "WOW Superheroes."

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: In WOW's season ender, the stakes are higher than ever. Newbie WOW Superhero, Nikki Nashville rises to the head of the class when she is matched with the veteran Classmaster, accompanied by the ever-scheming IQ Superior Samantha Smart.

programme.title: My Road To WOW
programme.desc: WOW Superheroes reveal their path to the ring. Keta Rush goes from bullied to bully buster, Tiki Chamorro represents the true pride of her island of Guam, and Kandi Krush rises from crushed Olympic dreams to crushing her opponents.

programme.title: My Road To WOW
programme.desc: WOW Superheroes reveal their path to the ring. Americana personifies the athleticism of WOW. She talks about her upbringing and how gymnastics are a part of her life.

programme.title: My Road To WOW
programme.desc: WOW Superheroes reveal their surprising backstories. Miami Sweet Heat's physical therapy patients are the real superheroes, Princess Aussie's journey to the U.S. almost didn't happen, and Jennifer Florez represents a new generation of wrestlers.

programme.title: My Road To WOW
programme.desc: WOW Superheroes reveal what drove them into the ring. Sahara Spars opens up about a traumatic life-changing experience, Jessie Jones reveals her long journey to the top, and Leia Makoa makes her parents and her island proud.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Tessa Blanchard invades WOW - Women Of Wrestling demanding a Championship Title Match. Champion Santana Garrett lets Tessa know she better get in line.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: With her father physically assaulted by Tessa Blanchard, Santana Garrett vows that the Championship is now second to her personal issues with The Born Legend.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: The Beast demands her shot at the WOW World Championship. Current Champion Santana Garrett’s eyes remain locked on revenge against Tessa Blanchard. And Tessa provides an exclusive interview that explains her reasons for attacking Santana’s father.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Champion Santana Garrett wants revenge on Tessa Blanchard for what she did to her beloved father. Born Legend, Tessa Blanchard gets what she wants… a shot at the Championship.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Psycho Sister Razor has her debut match against Faith The Lioness. Plus, following the unprecedented Triple Threat Match, the most prestigious prize in women’s wrestling, the WOW World Championship Title, is decided tonight!

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: The Norwegian Nightmare, Nikki Krampus makes her long-awaited debut. Beaten in a back alley, Keta Rush seeks revenge against her assailant The Dagger. But Keta soon finds that to succeed she will have to fight off the more than just The Dagger.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: A new Champion in WOW is coming to terms with the fact the bullseye of her competitors is now squarely focused on her. Havok, The Monster Of Madness emerges as a threat to the WOW roster.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Dedicated to her ambition of never quitting, Stephy Slays demonstrates perseverance in an extraordinary match against The Disciplinarian. The smart ending will be unforgettable. Meanwhile, Tessa Blanchard takes her biggest risk since joining WOW.

programme.desc: Pegasus's hired duelist Panik cheats Mai of all her star chips, and Yugi vows to defeat him and win them back. But when Panik's Castle of Dark Illusions enshrouds his monsters in a black mist, how can Yugi defeat an enemy he cannot see?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Despite his astonishing disadvantage, Yugi boldly provokes Panik - "I'll finish you in three turns." Is Yugi bluffing, or does he have the advantage in this battle of wits?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba descends to the kingdom to face Pegasus. Has Kaiba changed since his battle with Yugi, or is he still the same merciless duelist? A battle between Kaiba's Blue Eyes White Dragon and Joey's Red Eyes Black Dragon holds the answers!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bandit Keith's gang kidnaps Joey to a secret cave with a graveyard playing field. As Yugi and friends search for him, Joey faces Bandit Keith's zombie monsters which become stronger as they return from the grave!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey's last-ditch effort, his lucky Time Wizard card, fails against Bandit Keith's zombie monsters. But as his lucky streak comes to an end, will his improving skills as a duelist and his love for his sister inspire him to victory?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey band together in a team battle against the Paradox Brothers with all the Star Chips and entrance to Pegasus's castle on the line!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Paradox Brothers summon the almighty Gate Guardian, a monster that reflects all attacks! Is Joey helping Yugi in this duel, or is his lack of experience sealing their fate for defeat?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey each unleash their strongest monster, the Summoned Skull, and the Red-Eyes Black Dragon, but their strength pales in comparison to the tremendous power of the Gate Guardian.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In order to earn the right to challenge Pegasus, Kaiba must first beat Yugi and take his Star Chips. The rematch between Yugi and Kaiba is about to begin!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, the strongest monster in the game fused from three Blue-Eyes White Dragons! Yugi has lost all his powerful Duel Monsters, but a true duelist never gives up!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi begins spinning a strategy to put the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon to rest, but he must decide whether to claim victory or spare Kaiba his life. Yugi's heart is split in two!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Having lost his star chips to Kaiba and his only opportunity to save Grandpa, Yugi is in a state of shock. Can Tea bring Yugi back to consciousness by defeating Mai for her extra star chips and teach Yugi the heart of the duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends enter the castle to discover Kaiba ready to duel Pegasus with Mokuba's soul hanging in the balance! The power of the Millennium Eye gives Pegasus the ability to read other people's minds.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba is helpless against Pegasus's Toon World deck and mind-reading abilities. As the duel ends, Pegasus imprisons Kaiba's soul into a card, just like Grandpa and Mokuba!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi vows to overthrow Pegasus for the sake of his Grandpa. Tristan leads an exploration party to uncover Pegasus's secrets. While Joey sleeps, Bandit Keith steals from him the card that permits his entry in the final battle!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Under Pegasus's glare, Yugi is distracted from his duel with Mai. After making foolish errors and allowing Mai to gain a huge advantage with her Harpie's Pet Dragon, will Yugi gather his focus or succumb to the pressure?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai has rebounded from her previous loss to Joey to become a better duelist. Has Yugi learned from his loss to Kaiba, or is the emotional defeat still weighing on his heart? The answer is in the cards!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey searches for the card that permits him to enter the final battle, not realizing Bandit Keith has stolen it. As he struggles to accept the fact that Serenity will be blind forever, he receives help from a new friend!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Bandit Keith's Machine deck forces Joey to take the defensive, Joey mimics Keith's battle strategy to metalize his Red-Eyes Black Dragon! Is victory assured, or does the cheater Bandit Keith literally have one last card up his sleeve?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey challenges Yugi for the right to face Pegasus. In a battle between friends, a fierce match ensues between the two people who know each other's strategies and cards.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is shocked as Joey uses the Time Wizard card on him. It's the very same card Yugi gave Joey as a sign of friendship!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi prepares for the ultimate battle against Pegasus with the souls of Grandpa, Kaiba, and Mokuba on the line.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus punishes Yugi using the same Toon Deck and mind-reading abilities he used on Kaiba. As Pegasus turns Yugi's monsters against him, Yugi loses the will to battle. Will Pegasus capture Yugi's soul into a card, just like Kaiba?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has found a counter to Pegasus's mind-reading ability: Yugi switches back and forth between his two souls! Yugi is able to destroy Pegasus's Toon World, but the duel has just only begun. The next level of the deadly Shadow Game is about to start!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi crumples under the power of the Shadow Game. His friends yell desperate encouragement, but their voices cannot penetrate the sphere of darkness. Yugi's chance at victory is slipping away, as is his life!

programme.desc: After posting a hamboning (rhythmic thigh and knee-slapping) video online, Robbie is challenged for the title of Hambone King. When Robbie is beaten, Tori agrees to help Robbie avenge his defeat.

programme.desc: Tori gets an opportunity to perform a song at a big awards program, but she's pushed into altering everything about herself in the process.

programme.desc: Tori gets to sing at a big music awards show, but the producer wants to totally change her look and behavior. Tori agrees, but finds that she doesn't like her new image.

programme.title: Victorious: Three Girls And A Moose
programme.desc: Tori, Cat, and Jade compete with each other to win the affection of Beck's big, handsome, hockey-loving Canadian friend, Moose.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: iAm Your Biggest Fan: iCarly's biggest fan, Mandy, is invited onto the show as a one-girl studio audience. Mandy turns out to be more of a stalker than a fan and the kids have to get rid of her.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: iSaw Him First: When Carly and Sam show interest in the same boy, they vow to not let him come between them.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: Carly needs to intervene when Spencer becomes addicted to playing a video game.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: iOwe You: Sam is insulted when Freddie accuses her of not paying him and Carly back any of the money she's constantly borrowing.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: iHurt Lewbert: A "Messing With Lewbert" sketch goes horribly awry, injuring Carly's obnoxious doorman.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: iPie: When Carly, Sam, and Spencer bring Freddie to their favorite pie shop, they learn that its proprietor has passed away. Worse more, it appears that his recipes may be lost forever.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: When Spencer accidentally sets fire to Carly's presents, she wishes that she had a normal brother. A Christmas angel shows Carly what her life would be like.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: iKiss: Sam overhears Freddie confess to Carly that he's never kissed a girl, then exposes his secret on the webshow. Gibby and Carly train Spencer for a tryout with the local professional football team.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: iGive Away a Car: The gang runs a contest on iCarly -- the prize is a new car courtesy of a local dealership. After Nevel wins, the kids discover that the dealership had no knowledge of the contest or the free car they were supposedly donating.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: iMeet Fred: When Carly, Sam, and Freddie offend an internet video sensation named Fred, he tries to convince his viewers to never watch iCarly again.

programme.title: iCarly

programme.desc: iGo Nuclear: When Carly, Sam, and Freddie get an assignment at school to create an original project that benefits the environment, Carly ends up building an illegal nuclear-powered generator!

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: When Carly, Sam, and Freddie urge the iCarly fans to vote David Archuleta to victory on America Sings, they feel bad for the runner-up and help him make a music video. Meanwhile, Sam teaches Spencer how to lie like a pro.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: When Sam admits she has a crush on a boy at school, Carly teaches Sam how to entice him by acting more girly. Meanwhile, Spencer is convinced that a girl likes him because of his tuxedo, so he starts wearing it all the time.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: When Carly's old friend Missy moves back to Seattle, Sam believes Missy is trying to replace her as Carly's best friend.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: When Carly, Sam, and Freddie lose the iCarly URL to Nevel, he demands Carly kiss him if she wants their URL back. Meanwhile, Spencer has fun with the two hundred pillows he accidentally ordered.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: When Sam and Freddie both win a contest for the best locker in school, they are forced to share the same locker. Meanwhile, Carly asks Spencer to give her art lessons.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: Carly, Sam, and Freddie present iCarly Awards for best user-generated content, giving the awards to the winners live on the web show. Spencer enlists European swimsuit models to help him make the awards statuettes.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: Freddie tries to prove that Melanie, Sam's twin sister, is just Sam in disguise. Meanwhile, when Carly tutors Spencer's nemesis, Chuck, Spencer tries to convince her that Chuck is evil.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: 13-year-old Carly Shay and her friends, Sam and Freddie, create a homemade Web show called iCarly. With Freddie behind the camera and Carly and Sam hosting the show, you never know what to expect!

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: When Sam accidentally reveals to Carly that she and Freddie shared a secret kiss, Carly confronts them both about why they never told her about it. Meanwhile, Spencer goes to prison to teach an art class to convicts.

programme.desc: Cat convinces Sam to participate in a texting competition; Dice tries to avoid an old friend.
